maqras.text: 21|83|Aiyupaiyum (nam nam tutaraka anuppivaittom). Avar tan iraivanai nokki ‘‘niccayamaka noy ennaip pitittuk kontatu. (Atai ni nikki vitu.) Niyo karunaiyalarkalilellam maka karunaiyalan'' enru pirarttanai ceytar

21|84|akave, nam avarutaiya pirarttanaiyai ankikarittu, avaraip pitittirunta noyaiyum nikki, avarutaiya kutumpattaiyum nam avarukku alittu, nam arulal melum ataip ponra tokaiyinaraiyum avarukkuk (kutumpamakak) kotuttom. Itu (enakkup payantu) ennai vanankupavarkalukku(m ennitam pirarttanai ceypavarkalukkum) nallunarcci uttakkutiyataka irukkiratu
21|85|ismayilaiyum, itrisaiyum, tulkipluvaiyum (nam nam tutarkalaka anuppivaittom). Ivarkal anaivarum (tankalukku erpatta ciramankalaic) cakittuk kontanar
21|86|akave, ivarkal anaivaraiyum nam nam arulil pukuttinom. Enenral, niccayamaka ivarkal anaivarum nallavarkale

21|87|(yunus napiyakiya) tunnunaiyum (nam tutaraka akkinom). Avar kopamakac cenra camayattil nam avaraip pitittukkolla mattom enru ennikkontar. (Atalal, avarai oru min vilunkumpatic ceytu min vayirrin) irulkalilirunta avar (nam'mai nokki) ‘‘unnait tavira vanakkattirkuriya iraivan veroruvanum illai. Ni mikap paricuttamanavan. Niccayamaka nano aniyayakkararkalil oruvanakivitten. (Ennai mannittu arul purivayaka!)'' Enru pirarttanai ceytar

21|88|nam avarutaiya pirarttanaiyai ankikarittu (avarutaiya mikka tuyaramana) ciramattiliruntum avarai nam patukattuk kontom. Ivvare, (ciramattil cikki nam'mitam pirarttanai ceyyum) nampikkaiyalarkalaiyum nam patukattuk kolvom

21|89|Jakariyyavaiyum (tutaraka anuppivaittom). Avar tan iraivanai nokki ‘‘en iraivane! Ni ennai(c cantatiyarra) tanittavanaka vittuvitate! Niyo varicakakkutiyavarkalil mikka melanavan'' enru pirarttanai ceyta camayattil

21|90|nam avarutaiya pirarttanaiyai ankikarittu (malataka irunta) avarutaiya manaiviyai kunappatutti, yahyavai avarukku(c cantatiyakak) kotuttom. Niccayamaka ivarkal anaivarum nanmaiyana kariyankalaic ceyvatil oruvarai oruvar muntik kontiruntarkal. (Nam arulai) virumpiyum (nam tantanaiyaip) payantum nam'mitam pirarttanai ceytu kontiruntarkal. Ivarkal anaivarum nam'mitam mikka ullaccamutaiyavarkalakavum iruntarkal

21|91|tan karpaik kattukkonta (maryam enpa)valai(yum nir napaka muttuviraka. Nam tutar) jiprayil mulam avalutaiya karppattil nam utinom. Avalaiyum avalutaiya makanaiyum ulakattarukku or attatciyakavum akkinom

21|92|(nampikkaiyalarkale!) Ninkal anaivarum (ore markkattaip pinparra ventiya) ore vakuppartan. (Itil jati verrumai kitaiyatu.) Unkal anaivarukkum iraivan nan oruvane! Akave, ennaiye ninkal vanankunkal
21|93|eninum ivarkal tankal kariyattil (verupattu) pala pirivukalaka pirintu vittanar. Ivarkal anaivarum nam'mitam tirumpa varakkutiyavarkaltan
21|94|akave, (ivarkalil) evarkal nampikkaikontu narceyalkalaic ceykirarkalo avarkalutaiya muyarci vinakivitatu. Niccayamaka nam avarraip pativu ceytu varukirom
21|95|nam evvurarkalai alittuvittomo avarkal niccayamaka (ulakirku) tirumpave mattarkal ena vitikkappattullatu
21|96|Yahjuj, mahjuj kuttattirku vali tirakkappattal avarkal ovvoru mettiliruntum (tannir payntu otuvataip pol) valintu (ulakin pala pakankalilum aticikkirattil paravi) vituvarkal

21|97|(ulaka mutivu parriya) unmaiyana vakkuruti nerunki vittatu. (Atu varum camayattil ataik kanum) nirakarippavarkalin kankal tirantatu tirantavare irukkum. ‘‘Enkalukkuk ketutan. Niccayamaka nankal itaipparri kavalaiyarravarkalaka iruntome! Enkalukku nankale tinkilaittuk kontome!'' (Enrum avarkal pulampuvarkal)

21|98|(accamayam avarkalai nokki) ‘‘niccayamaka ninkalum, ninkal vanankik kontirunta allah allatavaiyum narakattin erikattaiyaki vittirkal. Ninkal anaivarum anku cella ventiyavarkaltan'' (enru kurappatum)
21|99|(avarkal vanankik kontirunta) ivai (unmaiyana) teyvankalaka iruntal narakattirku vante irukkatu. Eninum, avarkal anaivarum (narakattil tallappattu) enrenrum atil tankivituvarkal
21|100|atil avarkal tinarit tinarik (kalutaiyaip pol) kataruvarkal. Atil (marrevarin captattai) avarkal ceviyura mattarkal
21|101|erkanave nam'mal evarkalukku nanmaikal elutappattu vittato avarkal, niccayamaka narakattirku veku turamaka irupparkal
21|102|atan iraiccalaiyum avarkal (tankal katal) ketkamattarkal. Innum avarkal tankal virumpiya cukapokankalai(c corkkattil) enrenrum anupavittuk kontirupparkal

21|103|(marumaiyil erpatum) perum titukkamum avarkalai tukkattirkullakkatu. (Accamayam) vanavarkal avarkalai etirkontalaipparkal ‘‘unkalukku vakkalikkappatta (nalla) nal itutan'' (enru narceytiyum kuruvarkal)

21|104|Elutappatta katitattaic curuttuvataip pol nam vanattaic curuttum nalai (napiye!) Nir avarkalukku napakamuttuviraka. Mutal tatavai nam avarkalai pataittatu ponre (annalil) nam (avarkalukku uyir kotuttu) avarkalai milavaippom. Itu nam'mitu katamaiyanatoru vakkurutiyakum. Niccayamaka nam itaic ceyte tiruvom
21|105|niccayamaka nam ‘japur' ennum vetattil, nallupatecankalukkup pinnar elutiyirukkirom, ‘‘niccayamaka pumikku en atiyarkalil nannatattai utaiyavarkaltan varicavarkal'' enru
21|106|ennaiye vanankupavarkalukku niccayamaka itil oru narceyti irukkiratu
21|107|(napiye!) Um'mai ulakattarukku or arulakave tavira nam anuppavillai
21|108|(akave) nir kuruviraka: ‘‘Enakku vahyi arivikkappatuvatellam ‘‘unkal vanakkattirkuriya iraivan ore or iraivane'' enrutan. Akave, ninkal avanukku murrilum panintu kattuppattu natappirkalaka

21|109|(napiye!) Avarkal purakkanittu vittalo (avarkalai nokki) ‘‘nan (en tutai) unkal anaivarukkum camamaka etutturaittu vitten. Unkalukkup payamuruttappatum vetanai (vante tirum. Eninum, atu) camipattil irukkirata turattil irukkirata enpatai nan ariyamatten'' enru kuruviraka
21|110|niccayamaka (en iraivan) ninkal (vayal) captamittup pecuvataiyum (unkal ullankalil atarku maraka) maraittu vaittiruppataiyum arintu kolkiran
21|111|(innum ituvarai vetanai ceyyatu) unkalai vittu vaittiruppatu unkalaic cotippatarkakavo allatu kuritta kalam varai ninkal valntiruppatarkakavo enpatai nan ariya matten

21|112|(Melum muham'matu) kurinar: ‘‘En iraivane! (Enakkum innirakarippavarkalukkum itaiyil) ni nitamana tirppalippayaka! Enkal iraivantan perarulalan. Unkal (poyyana) kurrukalukku etiraka avanitame utavi tetukirom
